screen_desc: The screenshot shows the cart page on the Best Buy website, with a total of $1,308.18 in items. The pickup location is set to Bangor, and free shipping is available with an order before 8 pm. There is an option to unlock savings with a TotalTech membership. There are also product recommendations, including a Logitech G502 HERO SE Wired Optical Gaming Mouse.
action_think: The user wants to clear the entire cart. Based on the history actions, we have already accessed the cart page. The next step is to remove all items from the cart.
action_plan: Locate the delete button for each item in the cart and click on it to remove it from the cart.
Once all items are removed, the cart should be empty.
Locate the back button to go to the previous screen.
action_result: Scrolling up on the page has brought us back to the previous page where we had a clear view of the cart. This action is a step towards clearing all the items from the cart, as we can now see all the items and their prices, which is required to remove the items from the cart.
